Description: Allow users to create accounts, log in, and manage profiles securely.
Display products with high-resolution images, descriptions, prices, and variants (size, color).
Enable users to add products, view cart, and proceed to checkout with persistence (saves cart if logged out).
Implement a secure checkout with payment gateways (e.g., Stripe (https://stripe.com), PayPal (https://www.paypal.com)), shipping address selection, and order confirmation. Include a promo code field.
Allow users to track orders, view order history, and manage returns/exchanges.
Enable advanced search with autocomplete, spell correction, and filters for categories, sizes, colors, and prices.
Let users save products for later purchase.
Allow users to leave feedback and rate products to build trust and improve SEO.
Support promo codes, discounts, and loyalty programs.
Recommend products based on browsing history or preferences using AI-driven algorithms.
Make the platform fully responsive across all devices, prioritizing mobile-first design.
Allow product sharing and social logins (e.g., via Instagram (https://www.instagram.com), X (https://x.com)).
Add a blog for fashion tips, brand stories, or product features to engage users.
Provide real-time customer support through live chat or an AI chatbot.
Cater to international customers by supporting multiple languages and currencies.
Implement real-time stock updates to prevent overselling.
Track sales, user behavior, and metrics using tools like Google Analytics (https://analytics.google.com).
Include a field in the checkout form for promo codes, validate codes, and apply discounts (e.g., percentage off, free shipping).
Support sizes, colors, and styles for clothing products.
Include multiple high-resolution images with zoom and 360-degree views for better product visualization.
Offer detailed size guides on product pages to reduce returns.
Provide various shipping methods with estimated delivery times.
Calculate taxes based on the shipping address for accurate pricing.
Allow gift wrapping or custom embroidery for a premium touch.
Send reminder emails with discounts to recover lost sales.
Send order confirmations, shipping updates, and delivery notices.
Allow users to share wishlists via email or social media.
Offer password reset options for user convenience.
Implement image optimization, caching, and choose a high-performance hosting provider (e.g., Kinsta (https://kinsta.com)).
Use SSL/TLS encryption, ensure PCI DSS compliance, and conduct regular security audits.
Connect with shipping carriers, email marketing tools (e.g., Omnisend (https://www.omnisend.com)), and analytics platforms.
